languages.text: "С моста, который ведет в кабак, раз в оборот кто-нибудь да падает по пьяни. Кто-то скажет — надо поставить ограждения, а я скажу — пить надо уметь!"
"A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"
languages.original_text: "С моста, который ведет в кабак, раз в оборот кто-нибудь да падает по пьяни. Кто-то скажет — надо поставить ограждения, а я скажу — пить надо уметь!"

traits.locale_text: "A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"
"A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"
"A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"
"A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"
"A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"

languages.text: “每一巡，都会有一群醉鬼从酒吧外面的桥上摔下来。有些人可能会说，应该在桥上安装扶手什么的，但要我说的话，有些人应该学会把自己的酒拿稳！”
languages.original_text: "A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"

traits.locale_text: “每一巡，都会有一群醉鬼从酒吧外面的桥上摔下来。有些人可能会说，应该在桥上安装扶手什么的，但要我说的话，有些人应该学会把自己的酒拿稳！”

languages.text: «No pasa un turno sin que algún borracho se caiga del puente que hay al lado del bar. Algunos dicen que habría que poner barandillas. ¡Yo creo que la gente tiene que aprender a beber!».
languages.original_text: "A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"

traits.locale_text: «No pasa un turno sin que algún borracho se caiga del puente que hay al lado del bar. Algunos dicen que habría que poner barandillas. ¡Yo creo que la gente tiene que aprender a beber!».

languages.text: 「1回転するごとに、どこぞの酔っ払いがバーの外の橋から落ちてしまう。柵を設置しろと言う奴もいるだろが、俺に言わせりゃ酒に飲まれるような奴が悪いんだ！」
languages.original_text: "A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"

traits.locale_text: 「1回転するごとに、どこぞの酔っ払いがバーの外の橋から落ちてしまう。柵を設置しろと言う奴もいるだろが、俺に言わせりゃ酒に飲まれるような奴が悪いんだ！」

languages.text: "Es vergeht keine Umdrehung, ohne dass irgendein besoffener Kerl vor der Bar von der Brücke stürzt. Manche sagen, man sollte endlich ein Geländer anmontieren, aber ich sage, wer nicht trinken kann, sollte es lassen!"
languages.original_text: "A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"

traits.locale_text: "Es vergeht keine Umdrehung, ohne dass irgendein besoffener Kerl vor der Bar von der Brücke stürzt. Manche sagen, man sollte endlich ein Geländer anmontieren, aber ich sage, wer nicht trinken kann, sollte es lassen!"

languages.text: « À chaque tour, on a un pauvre ivrogne qui tombe du pont devant le bar. C'est vrai qu'on pourrait installer des rambardes, mais d'un autre côté, les gens ont qu'à mieux tenir l'alcool ! »
languages.original_text: "A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"

traits.locale_text: « À chaque tour, on a un pauvre ivrogne qui tombe du pont devant le bar. C'est vrai qu'on pourrait installer des rambardes, mais d'un autre côté, les gens ont qu'à mieux tenir l'alcool ! »

languages.text: "Bir devir geçmiyor ki sarhoş herifin teki barın dışındaki köprüden düşmesin. Birileri çıkmış diyor, vay neden köprüye korkuluk taktırmadınız? Kardeşim sen önce sorsana, bu millet niye ağzıyla içmeyi bilmiyor?"
languages.original_text: "A turn doesn't go by without some drunken sod falling off the bridge outside the bar. Some might say someone should install rails on that thing, but I say someone should learn to hold their booze!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir devir geçmiyor ki sarhoş herifin teki barın dışındaki köprüden düşmesin. Birileri çıkmış diyor ki, vay neden köprüye korkuluk taktırmadınız? Kardeşim sen önce sorsana, bu millet niye ağzıyla içmeyi bilmiyor?"
